enum.name: COMPONENT_CONTROL
enum.description: Type of controls or state changes for system components.

entry.name: COMPONENT_CONTROL_RESTART_AND_KEEP_BL
entry.description: Restart/reboot system component and keep it in the bootloader until upgraded.

entry.name: COMPONENT_CONTROL_ENABLE
entry.description: Enable system component. Used to switch a system component from an idle state to an active state.

entry.name: COMPONENT_CONTROL_DISABLE
entry.description: Disable system component. Used to switch a system component from an active state to an idle state.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_COMPONENT_CONTROL
entry.description: Control the state or functionality of system components.
entry.param: Component ID of the system component to be controlled.
Control command type being sent to the system component.
Component instance, when there is more than one instance per component.
